document.full_text: r.a. dickey  said he was prepared to make his next scheduled start on tuesday despite a foot injury, but manager terry collins isn't so convinced.
document.title: dickey says he is ready to start, but collins isn't so sure
lines_and_colors: r.a. dickey  said he was prepared to make his next scheduled start on tuesday despite a foot injury, but manager terry collins isn't so convinced.
